varselforgroenland.name: Warning for Greenlandic seaareas
varselforgroenland.text:
Warning number. 657 is still valid.
There is gale warning for Daneborg, Kangikajik, Timmiarmiut, Nunap Isuata Kangia, Nunap Isuata Kitaa, Nunarsuit, Narsalik and Meqquitsoq.

gyldighed.name: Validhoures
gyldighed.text: Forecast, valid to Wednesday the 1. January, 06 UTC.

oversigt.name: Synoptic situation
oversigt.text: A low, 1005 hPa, northeast of Iceland, is moving towards westnorthwest to Kangikajik, gradually filling some. A low, 9805 hPa, over Labrador Sea, is moving slowly towards north.

udsigtfordaneborg.name: Forecast for Daneborg
udsigtfordaneborg.text: North and northeast, 8 to 13 m/s, this night in western up to gale, 15 m/s, Tuesday east and northeast, 8 to 13 m/s, becoming southeast and decreasing to 5 to 10 m/s. Locally fog and transiently rain from east, mainly moderate to poor visibility, Tuesday gradually some improving visibility from southeast.

wavesdaneborg.name: Waves Daneborg
wavesdaneborg.text: Significant wave height: 3 m. Swells: 2,5 m.
